gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 133, Hornets 112
gameRecap.excerpt: The Lakers defeated the Hornets, 133-112. Anthony Davis recorded a game-high 26 points to go along with eight rebounds and four blocks for the Lakers, with LeBron James adding 17 points and 11 assists in the victory. Miles Bridges tallied 20 points, five rebounds, and five assists for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Lakers improve to 17-15 in the regular season, while the Hornets fall to 7-22.
